mixins.description:
Includes the styles for material design buttons. Each button type can optionally
be excluded. However, if the `floating` styles are included, the `icon` styles
will also be included.

context.name: react-md-buttons

parameter.name: primary-color
parameter.description:
The primary color to theme the
    buttons with.

parameter.name: secondary-color
parameter.description:
The secondary color to theme
    the buttons with.

parameter.name: light-theme
parameter.description:
Boolean if the buttons should be styled
    for the light theme.

parameter.name: include-media
parameter.description:
Boolean if the media queries should
    also be included in this mixin.

parameter.name: include-flat
parameter.description:
Boolean if the flat styles for
    buttons should be included.

parameter.name: include-raised
parameter.description:
Boolean if the raised styles for
    buttons should be included.

parameter.name: include-icon
parameter.description:
Boolean if the icon styles for
    buttons should be included.

parameter.name: include-floating
parameter.description:
Boolean if the floating styles for
    buttons should be included.

usedBy.description:
Includes every component, transition, and typography including their
media queries if the `$md-media-included` variable is `true`. You can
modify any global variables before including this mixin to change the overall
theme.

context.name: react-md-everything

mixins.description:
Themes the buttons ONLY when the `$primary-color` does not equal the `$md-primary-color`,
the `$secondary-color` does not equal the `$md-secondary-color`, or the `$md-light-theme`
does not equal the `$md-light-theme`.

context.name: react-md-theme-buttons

parameter.name: primary-color
parameter.description:
The primary color to theme the
    buttons with.

parameter.name: secondary-color
parameter.description:
The secondary color to theme
    the buttons with.

parameter.name: light-theme
parameter.description:
Boolean if the buttons should be styled
    for the light theme.

parameter.name: include-flat
parameter.description:
Boolean if the flat styles for
    buttons should be included.

parameter.name: include-raised
parameter.description:
Boolean if the raised styles for
    buttons should be included.

parameter.name: include-icon
parameter.description:
Boolean if the icon styles for
    buttons should be included.

parameter.name: include-floating
parameter.description:
Boolean if the floating styles for
    buttons should be included.

usedBy.description:
Updates the styles of every component with the new theme colors. If there
are components that do not change if the `$light-theme` variable is the same,
their updated styles will not be included. This is useful if you want to switch
between the light or dark theme, or even the entire theme colors while keeping
the base css the same between all themes.

In addition, if the theme colors do not switch, those styles will not be created.
So this allows the same colors between light and dark themes.

If you switch between the light and dark theme, you will need to give a `$html-class-name`
That will nest every component inside.

context.name: react-md-theme-everything
